snippet: In Beijing, Tokyo, Seoul and other major capitals across Asia, the early reaction to Representative Paul Ryan's selection as Mitt Romney's running mate was muted. One commentator said Mr. Ryan "ticks most boxes" for the Republican candidate, while...
abstract: In Beijing, Tokyo, Seoul and other major capitals across Asia, the early reaction to Representative Paul Ryan's selection as Mitt Romney's running mate was muted. One commentator said Mr. Ryan "ticks most boxes" for the Republican candidate, while another said he might restrain Mr. Romney's "potentially disastrous China-bashing."

headline.main: For Asia, So Far, Paul Ryan Remains Out of Focus
